name: Madrid Vice
description:
Description:

A game about corruption, black cards, lobbys payment and enraged people.

You have to avoid people or pass through them, collect money from items, pay buisnessmen and scape from Treasury Department.

Controls:

Pay people to earn points, collect cards and cash to earn mone to pay and get TVs to avoid Treasury Department.

A: Change line

S: Pay Buisnessmen / Repeat S: pass through rage people
